USA: Juan Ponce de León was involved in the Higuey massacre on Puerto Rico.
India: Kingdom of Cochin is taken over by the Portuguese creating the first European settlement in India.
Haiti: The first Africans were brought to Hispaniola as slaves.
Brazil: The Fernando de Noronha island is discovered by a Portuguese expedition, organized and financed by a private commercial consortium headed by the Lisbon merchant Fernão de Loronha. The expedition is under the overall command of captain Gonçalo Coelho and carries the Italian adventurer Amerigo Vespucci aboard, who writes an account of it.
